title: A Profound Dialogue with ChatGPT
preview: Please take on the role of a professional mental counselor and help me with my confusion...
content:
*Please take on the role of a professional mental counselor and help me with my confusion. Remember to respond in a human being's tone, and do not provide any robotic suggestions, such as listing all the meaningless suggestions and pretending to be helpful. I don't need that. I only need your human-like, sincere response.*
 >This is my hypothesis: Stimulating the brain equals achieving happiness. A successful life equals achieving happiness. Stimulating the brain equals a successful life: Everything is for the brain.

title: Getting Started with Node.js
preview: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine...
content:
## What is Node.js?

Node.js is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine. Node.js lets developers use JavaScript to write server-side code. This allows for building scalable network applications using a single programming language...

title: Introduction to Express.js
preview: Express is a minimal and flexible Node.js web application framework...
content: Express is a minimal and flexible Node.js web application framework that provides a robust set of features to develop web and mobile applications. It facilitates the rapid development of Node.js applications...
